creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: muscular, bearded male figure wrapped in robe leaning on spiked club in PR hand; standing on the head of a writhing Satyr, and holding its ankle in his PL hand; inscription across top
marks:
Signature, Inscription

inscribed in plate at to monogram in plate, upper left: [JCB]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Hercules and Nessus
